english.segment2: You have me by the heart. Wrapped around Your finger sweet. Ive tasted of Your love. Now all I want is more of You. Youre in my heart. All the time. I live cause You live in me. Youre in my world. Im complete. I live cause You live in me
english.segment3: No other love like this. On my knees I kiss Your feet. One moment I cant endure. If Youre not near. If Youre not near
english.segment4: I love You for all that You are. Not for the way that You give. Every day I live I am Yours. Every day I live.
